title: Parker MLB - Braves Smart Puig Signing; Céspedes Comeback Watch; Umps Opting Out; Cubs 60-Game Season Preview
itunes:title: Parker MLB - Braves Smart Puig Signing; Céspedes Comeback Watch; Umps Opting Out; Cubs 60-Game Season Preview
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob likes the Braves acquisition of Yasiel Puig, why he's excited for the return of Yoenis Céspedes returning to the Mets, and why he understands umpires opting out of the shortened season. MLB VP of Baseball and Softball Development Tony Reagins discusses his strategies for growing the sport domestically in minority communities. Cubs Insider Gordon Wittenmyer joins the pod to look at the challenges MLB faces in pulling off a shortened season, and previews the Cubs heading into the 60-game season. Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
